data.lyric:
[ti:Hands On]
[ar:Kanye West/Fred Hammond]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Hands On - Kanye West/Fred Hammond
[00:00.62]Hand 'em
[00:03.24]Hands up high hands on hands on
[00:05.83]Hands on hands up
[00:06.61]In your face the reason
[00:08.96]Hands on yeah hands on
[00:12.63]Cut out all the lights He the light
[00:15.44]Got pulled over see the brights
[00:18.54]What you doin' on the street at night
[00:21.52]Wonder if they're gonna read your rights
[00:24.77]Thirteenth Amendment three strikes
[00:27.61]Made a left when I should've made a right
[00:30.76]Told God last time on life
[00:33.60]Told the devil that I'm going on a strike
[00:36.66]Told the devil when I see him on sight
[00:39.78]I've been working for you my whole life
[00:42.84]Told the devil that I'm going on a strike
[00:45.80]I've been working for you my whole life
[00:49.38]Nothing worse than a hypocrite
[00:52.34]Change he ain't really different
[00:55.49]He ain't even try to get permission
[00:58.58]Ask for advice and they dissed him
[01:01.58]Said I'm finna do a gospel album
[01:04.57]What have you been hearin' from the Christians
[01:07.69]They'll be the first one to judge me
[01:10.79]Make it feel like nobody love me
[01:13.87]They'll be the first one to judge me
[01:16.99]Feelin' like nobody love me
[01:20.08]Told people God was my mission
[01:23.06]What have you been hearin' from the Christians
[01:26.17]They'll be the first one to judge me
[01:29.18]Make it feel like nobody love me
[01:32.35]Make you feel alone in the dark and you'll never see the light
[01:36.03]Man you're never seein' home and you never see the domes
[01:38.89]I can feel it when I write point of livin' in the right
[01:41.95]If they only see the wrongs never listen to the songs
[01:45.01]Just to listen is a fight but you booked me for the fight
[01:48.12]It's so hard to get along if they only see the slight
[01:51.18]From the love of religion
[01:53.86]What have you been hearin' from the Christians
[01:56.88]They'll be the first one to judge me
[01:59.99]Make it seem like nobody love me
[02:03.07]I'm not tryna lead you to Visas
[02:06.15]But if I try to lead you to Jesus
[02:09.28]We get called halfway believers
[02:12.31]Only halfway read Ephesians
[02:15.46]Only if they knew what I knew uh
[02:18.52]I was never new 'til I knew of
[02:21.60]True and living God Yeshua
[02:24.56]The true and living God
[02:26.36]Somebody pray for me
[02:27.94]Hand 'em
[02:29.25]Hands up high hands on hands on
[02:32.07]Hands on hands up
[02:33.89]In your face the reason
[02:36.19]Hands on yeah hands on
[02:40.07]I deserve all the criticism you got
[02:43.10]If that's all the love you have that's all you got
[02:46.23]To sing of change you think I'm joking
[02:49.67]To praise His name you ask what I'm smoking
[02:52.86]Yes I understand your reluctancy yeah
[02:56.80]But I have a request you see
[02:59.15]Don't throw me up lay your hands on me
[03:02.54]Please pray for me
[03:05.05]Hold myself on death
[03:06.37]Hold it down all fallen down
[03:09.28]Somebody pray for me
[03:11.15]Hand 'em
[03:12.23]Hands up high hands on hands on
[03:15.55]Hands on hands up
[03:16.96]In your face the reason
[03:19.61]Hands on yeah hands on
data.trans:
[ti:Hands On]
[ar:Kanye West/Fred Hammond]
[al:JESUS IS KING]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.62]伸出双手
[00:03.24]高举双手
[00:05.83]团聚一起 向上帝祈祷
[00:06.61]理由显而易见 就在你面前
[00:08.96]请接受基督教的洗礼
[00:12.63]熄灭所有灯光 主就是光芒
[00:15.44]开车被拦下 看见了光明
[00:18.54]你在深夜的大街上做什么呢
[00:21.52]好奇人们是否了解你的权力
[00:24.77]不过是提到奴隶制 受到四面八方的批评
[00:27.61]明明应该向右行 我偏偏要向左转
[00:30.76]最后一次与上帝对话
[00:33.60]告诉恶魔 我就要逃脱你的束缚
[00:36.66]劝诫恶魔 一旦相见 我不会手下留情
[00:39.78]我的一生都在为你效力
[00:42.84]告诉恶魔 我就要逃脱你的束缚
[00:45.80]劝诫恶魔 一旦相见 我不会手下留情
[00:49.38]没有什么比伪君子更可恶
[00:52.34]别说什么改变 其实他始终如一
[00:55.49]他并没有试着获得人们的认可
[00:58.58]只是征求意见 却引来恶语相向
[01:01.58]我曾说自己最终会制作一张福音专辑
[01:04.57]人们却说基督教到底给我灌了什么迷药
[01:07.69]他们是第一批随意批判我的人
[01:10.79]让我感到没人爱我
[01:13.87]他们是第一批随意批判我的人
[01:16.99]让我感到没人爱我
[01:20.08]我告诉人们 顺从上帝才是我的使命
[01:23.06]人们却说基督教到底给我灌了什么迷药
[01:26.17]他们是第一批随意批判我的人
[01:29.18]让我感到没人爱我
[01:32.35]让你在黑暗中感到孤独 仿佛不能重见光明
[01:36.03]兄弟 你没有见过教堂 你没能见过其穹顶
[01:38.89]当我写下这首歌时 我能感到生活的真谛
[01:41.95]如果他们强烈反对我的信仰 干脆不要听我的歌
[01:45.01]因为听我的歌就是一场战斗 而你自投罗网
[01:48.12]如果人们只看到轻蔑的一面 那就很难相处
[01:51.18]因为没能看到我对宗教的热爱
[01:53.86]人们却说基督教到底给我灌了什么迷药
[01:56.88]他们是第一批随意批判我的人
[01:59.99]让我感到没人爱我
[02:03.07]我没有打算将你引渡出国
[02:06.15]只想带你去往耶稣的国度
[02:09.28]我们这种人被称作半路出家
[02:12.31]只看了一半的以弗所书
[02:15.46]要是人们懂得我了解的事情就好了
[02:18.52]我从未重获新生
[02:21.60]直到我领悟永活的真神 耶和华
[02:24.56]这唯一的救世主
[02:26.36]请为我祈祷
[02:27.94]伸出双手
[02:29.25]高举双手
[02:32.07]团聚一起 向上帝祈祷
[02:33.89]理由显而易见 就在你面前
[02:36.19]请接受基督教的洗礼
[02:40.07]所有的批评都是我咎由自取
[02:43.10]如果那就是你拥有的爱意 你拥有的一切
[02:46.23]我歌颂这转变 你还以为这是玩笑话
[02:49.67]我赞美主的名字 你却觉得我是抽嗨了
[02:52.86]我明白你心里不愿意接受这件事情
[02:56.80]但我有个小小的要求
[02:59.15]请不要抛弃我 请将你的手搭在我的身上
[03:02.54]请为我祈祷
[03:05.05]坚持我的信仰 直到死去
[03:06.37]保持安静 都为主俯身
[03:09.28]请为我祈祷
[03:11.15]伸出双手
[03:12.23]高举双手
[03:15.55]团聚一起 向上帝祈祷
[03:16.96]理由显而易见 就在你面前
[03:19.61]请接受基督教的洗礼
